ETYMOLOGY: From prefix re- (again) + appear (from Old French apareir, ultimately from Latin apparere, ad- 'to' + parere 'come into sight').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To appear again after having been absent or out of sight.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: After a week of sickness, the actor will reappear on stage tonight.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 生病一周后，这位演员将于今晚重返舞台。
